show_name: Choujin Koukousei-tachi wa Isekai demo Yoyuu de Ikinuku you desu!
other_title: Super Human High Schoolers Are in Another World, But Seem to be Living in Comfort!
CHOYOYU!: High School Prodigies Have It Easy Even in Another World!
超人高校生たちは異世界でも余裕で生き抜くようです！
opening_theme: "Hajimete no Kakumei! (はじめてのかくめい！)" by DIALOGUE＋ (eps 2-11)
ending_theme: "dear my distance" by Akari Kitou (鬼頭明里)
